thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 4 of 707
thread.title: Lisa
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text: The transaction was really easy from start to end, and the car was new and all very nice. My only minor problem was that I asked the desk clerk where to buy petrol before returning the car and he asked me where I was coming from and then he told me that I would pass 2 petrol stations on my way to the airport. When in fact I came straight off a motor way and passed no petrol stations at all. I had enough time to go out and find one in order to save myself paying the very expensive rate that they charge if you don't refill.
